== Elanjipra (627904) ==

Elanjipra is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 216 hectares and harbouring 1254 households with total population of 4895 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chalakudy]] is at a distance of 5 km. Male population is 2420 and female population is 2475. Scheduled Caste Population is 207 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1. Census Location Code of the village is 627904<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
